Entries.default:
This device is a complex control panel made of gems set in movable, stone impressions. Four colorful gemstones are positioned around a hole in the center. 

Something appears to be missing, though an expert tinkerer might be able to compensate for it.
[Examine the absence in the center.]
[Leave.]
It looks like the setting for a gemstone. Scratch marks would suggest that someone, or something, pried the stone free.
[Place the clear crystal into the hole.]
The crystal settles into its intended depression with a soft click. The surrounding gemstones immediately flash with brilliant, colored lights.
This control panel is comprised of four colorful gemstones positioned around a single, clear crystal in the center. The four gems can be manipulated in a wide array of different configurations.
[Enter the combination you found.]
[Fiddle with the panel, see if you can get something to work.]
After a great deal of careful manipulation, the gemstones around the unoccupied hole flash with brilliant, colored lights. The workaround, it would seem, was a success.
Fiddling with the panel yields no results.
[Have someone tinker with the panel to see if anything works.]
As a result of careful tinkering, the gems set around this control panel glow with arcane luminescence.
You rotate the gemstones into their intended configuration. The sound of grinding stone builds in volume as the door moves aside.
After some gentle attention with a practiced hand, a soft click and an arcane fizzle erupt from the lock. [Specified 0] surveys the job well done with a satisfied smile.
Fiddling with the panel yields no results. [Specified 0] sighs and aims a determined glare at the panel.
[Rotate the gems to experiment with various positions.]
You manipulate the gems in their settings, but the amount of possible combinations leaves you at a loss. It would appear that this lock requires something more.
[Rotate the gems to experiment with various positions.]
You manipulate the gems in their settings, but the amount of possible combinations leaves you at a loss. It would appear that this lock requires something more.
[Examine the gemstones.]
The gemstones around the axis of the lock can be manipulated into a number of different configurations, like a combination lock.
These gems are exactly like the ones referenced in the combination you discovered earlier. You already know what specific rotations and positions will open this lock.
Tinkering with the central depression has already yielded the necessary workaround to open the lock. All that remains is to enter the combination.
The vacant hole in the center of the lock suggests that a component is still missing.
Now that the missing crystal has been inserted into the central panel, all that remains is to rotate the surrounding gems in the correct combination.
[Examine the gemstones.]
These gems are exactly like the ones referenced in the combination you discovered earlier. You already know what specific rotations and positions will open this lock.
Now that the missing crystal has been inserted into the central panel, all that remains is to rotate the surrounding gems in the correct combination.
Tinkering with the central depression has already yielded the necessary workaround to open the lock. All that remains is to enter the combination.
The vacant hole in the center of the lock suggests that a component is still missing.
The gemstones around the axis of the lock can be manipulated into a number of different configurations, like a combination lock.
